image.description: The file path for this condition card's image.

name.description: The conditions's name as written on the card itself.

xws.description: The conditions's unique XWS id as described in the XWS format.

text.description: The condition card's text describing its effect.

unique.description:
Some condition cards have unique names, which are identified by the bullet to the left of the name.
 A player cannot field two or more cards that share the same unique name, even if those cards are of different types.

id.description: The condition's unique id number. It's not used in the game but it's used to link this condition to other data in this dataset.
